projects.name: CloudSync
achievements: Developed a high-performance data transfer application with .NET, React.js, and Material UI, achieving an  85% improvement in transfer times and $100,000 annual storage cost savings

Created an intuitive UI with real-time tracking, streamlining user experience and reducing manual intervention

projects.name: RMS DMT

projects.name: PreprocessorWeb
